thread.title: The Weekend Performs Acoustic Version of 'The Hills' on 'Live Lounge'
thread.title_full: The Weekend Performs Acoustic Version of 'The Hills' on 'Live Lounge'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: The Weekend Performs Acoustic Version of 'The Hills' on 'Live Lounge'
text:
Comments The Canadian singer visited the show and performed there while promoting his 'Beauty Behind the Madness' album in the U.K. 
The Weeknd stopped by BBC Radio 1's "Live Lounge" on Wednesday, September 30. The Canadian singer, who's in the U.K. to promote his new album, performed a stripped-down rendition of his latest No. 1 single "The Hills" during his visit to the show. As seen in a video shared on YouTube, the Weekend's performance was pretty simple. Though he's joined on the dimly-lit stage by a full band, the 25-year-old crooner mostly showcased his vocals only over soft guitar riffs. Earlier in September, "The Hills" jumped to No. 1 on Billboard Hot 100 and replaced The Weeknd's other hit "Can't Feel My Face". The single is currently spending its second week atop the list. The Weeknd's two No. 1 hits are featured on his latest album " Beauty Behind the Madness " which has spent three consecutive weeks at No. 1 on Billboard 200. The singer will support the record with a tour that's set to open in early November.
